text: New Mexico's 1st congressional district () is a congressional district is the U.S state of New Mexico. The district is in the middle of the state. The district has the counties of Bernalillo County, all of Torrance County, and parts of Sandoval, Santa Fe and Valencia counties. It also includes almost most of Albuquerque. The people who live in the district elect a person to represent the district in the United States House of Representatives. The district is currently represented by Democrat Melanie Stansbury. ==Election history== Year Office Result 2000 President Gore 48 - 47% 2004 President Kerry 51 - 48% 2008 President Obama 60 - 40% 2012 President Obama 55 - 40% 2016 President Clinton 52 - 35% 2018 Senate Heinrich 52 - 35% 2018 Governor Lujan Grisham 61 - 39% 2020 President Biden 60 - 37% ===2000=== ===2002=== ===2004=== ===2006=== ===2008=== ===2010=== ===2012=== ===2014=== ===2016=== ===2018=== ===2020=== === 2021 (special) === ==References== 01
title: New Mexico's 1st congressional district
